title: Minimum number of votes and $BUCKS needed to pass any proposal for Buckswap.io and the $BUCKS token
body:
A minimum number of votes and $BUCKS needed to approve any proposal otherwise the proposal is void and dropped. Can be resubmitted until minimum votes and $BUCKS achieved with a capping on the number of times the same proposal can be submitted. 

The suggested limits are as follows:

SUGGESTION (A):
- Minimum number of 100 voters
- Minimum amount of 5000 $BUCKS
- Proposal Attempts: 3 attempts

SUGGESTION (B):
- Minimum number of 1% of current token holders (number of holders on BSC multiplied by 1%)
- Minimum amount of 10,000 $BUCKS
- Proposal Attempts: 3 attempt

SUGGESTION (C):
- Minimum number of 500 voters
- Minimum amount of 20,000 $BUCKS
- Proposal Attempts: 5 attempts
author: 0xd0e08a720A1e225a42165Cbb50493FB70f31f7b2
